meanings.sent1: She is the whizziest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The car with the whizziest features won the race.
meanings.sent3: The whizziest dancer at the party had everyone clapping.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the whizziest light in the room.
meanings.sent5: The whizziest fireworks lit up the night sky.

meanings.sent1: He always wears the whizziest outfits to school.
meanings.sent2: The whizziest gadget on the market is selling out fast.
meanings.sent3: The whizziest cake at the bake sale disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: His jokes are the whizziest, always making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The whizziest roller coaster in the amusement park was a thrilling experience.
